content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5) storing coal.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5) storing copper ore.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-20.0, y=-70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-20.0, y=-70.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-16.5, y=-69.5) transferring items between chests and furnaces.
- Wooden Chests for storage at various positions.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) processing iron ore into copper plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring items between chests and furnaces.
- Wooden Chests for storage at various positions.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chests for storage at various positions.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) transferring items between chests and furnaces.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check the inventory of the source to confirm availability.

### Furnace Fuel Source is Full
- Regularly check the output of the furnaces to ensure they are not full, which can halt production. Consider adding more storage or processing the output more frequently.

### Chest is Full
- Monitor the inventory levels of chests to prevent them from becoming full, which can block inserters and halt production lines.
